transform_def.name: designed19
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) a = p_in * p_in.x b = p_in * p_in.y zw = complex(length(p_in), length(p_in)) quat = vec4(a.x * b.x - a.y * b.y - zw.re * zw.im - zw.re * zw.im, a.x * b.y + a.y * b.x + zw.re * zw.im - zw.re * zw.im, a.x * zw.im - a.y * zw.im + zw.re * b.x + zw.re * b.y, a.x * zw.im + a.y * zw.im - zw.re * b.y + zw.re * b.x) s = (e0(quat) * e2(quat)) / (e1(quat) * e3(quat)) z = (if r < invpi() then (cos(s) / pi()) * sin(length(p_in) - s * pi()) else p_in.x * s / fourpi()) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
